hero.title: Discover Turkish
hero.description: Your comprehensive Turkish dictionary with meanings, examples, and translations. Perfect for learners and native speakers alike.
hero.searchError: Please enter a word to search

feature1.title: Contribute New Words
feature1.description: Add new Turkish words and their meanings to help grow our dictionary. Share your knowledge with the community.

feature2.title: Edit and Improve
feature2.description: Help improve existing entries by suggesting edits and corrections. Keep our dictionary accurate and up-to-date.

feature3.title: Save for Later
feature3.description: Create your personal collection of words. Save interesting words to review later and track your learning progress.
